titleInfo.title: Dataset for: "Contribution to understanding the phase structure of strong interaction matter: Lee-Yang edge singularities from lattice QCD"

mods.abstract: This Data Publication contains all necessary data files to reproduce all figures in [arXiv:2110.15933](https://arxiv.org/abs/2110.15933), to be published in Physical Review D.

subject.topic: Lattice QCD at nonzero temperature and density
